Class CostDeciders.AvoidSettlementsAndBlockingUnitsCostDecider

    CostDeciders

    private static class CostDeciders.AvoidSettlementsAndBlockingUnitsCostDecider
extends CostDeciders.AvoidSettlementsCostDecider
    A CostDecider that costs unit moves normally while avoiding other player settlements and units, and does not explore if it is trading.

        Description copied from class: BaseCostDecider
        Determines the cost of a single move.
        Specified by:
        getCost in interface CostDecider
        Overrides:
        getCost in class CostDeciders.AvoidSettlementsCostDecider

        unit - The Unit making the move.
